page.title: 08RELIGION
page.content: St.John the Evangelist,Perry Barr is 150 years old and is the oldest church in the area.At present it is being restored as it in urgent need of preservation due to weathering.The graveyard is overgrown and is also being attended to.A local firm, Sandicliffe,has agreed to sponsor restoration work from the sale of each new Ford car. St.Matthews was built out of the living of St.John's church in the late 1930's.The original building is now used as a church hall and a modern 7-sided building was consecrated in 1964. There is an active congregation of about 80 communicants each Sunday with services held in the chapel every day. Perry Beeches Methodist Hall has a thriving congregation and so too does the Baptist Church,with a Boys Brigade band
